units.title: Organoid dissociation
units.text:
Cerebral organoids were dissociated in papain containing DNase cocktai
Nuclei were isolated by resuspending cell pellets in 200 μl dig-wash buffer
units.rationale: Describes the enzymatic dissociation of organoids for downstream processing.

units.title: pA‑Tn5 addition for CUT&Tag
units.text: pA-Tn5 was added at a dilution of 1:100 in 100 μl dig-med buffer (0.05% digitonin, 20 mM HEPES, pH 7.5, 150 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM spermidine, 1× protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche)).
units.rationale: Provides the reagent mix and concentration for tagmentation.

units.title: Primary antibody incubation
units.text: After 18 days, organoids with 2 mM EDTA and a 1:50 dilution of H3K27ac primary antibody (Cell Signaling 8173), and incubated overnight at 4 °C on an overhead rotaorbital shaker rotating at 90 rpm, and changed to Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM)/F12-based medium containing 1× glutamax, 600g and washing twice in 200 μl dig-wash buffer.
units.rationale: Details the antibody binding step and incubation conditions.

units.title: Removal of excess primary antibody
units.text: Excess primary antibody was removed by pelleting the nuclei at 600g and washing twice in 200 μl dig-wash buffer.
units.rationale: Describes the wash step to eliminate unbound antibody.

units.title: Single‑cell RNA‑seq library generation
units.text:
Single-cell RNA-seq libraries were generated using the 10X Genomics Chromium 3′ Gene Expressi
Nuclei were pelleted at 500g for 5 min at 4 °C.
units.rationale: Specifies the platform used to create scRNA‑seq libraries.

units.title: DNA purification with AMPure beads
units.text: DNA was purified with a 1.5:1 ratio of AMPure XP beads (Beckman) following the manufacturer’s instructions. Purified DNA was eluted in 21 μl buffer EB (10 mM Tris-Cl, pH 8.5).
units.rationale: Outlines the bead‑based cleanup and elution of DNA.

units.title: Library amplification PCR conditions
units.text: Libraries were amplified with the cycling conditions: 72 °C for 5 min; 98 °C for 30 s; 12 cycles of 98 °C for 10 s and 63 °C for 30 s; 72 °C for 5 min.
units.rationale: Lists the thermal cycling program for library PCR.

units.title: Sequencing of generated libraries
units.text: libraries were generated and sequenced on an Illumina NovaSeq with a target sequencing depth of 50 million reads per library.
units.rationale: States the sequencing platform and desired depth for the libraries.
